text: Kankan is a region in the east of Guinea. It is bordered by the countries of Mali and Côte d'Ivoire and the Guinean regions of Nzérékoré and Faranah. The regional capital is the city of Kankan. As of the 2014 census, 1,986,329 people lived there. It has an area of . == Prefectures == * Kankan Prefecture * Kérouané Prefecture * Kouroussa Prefecture * Mandiana Prefecture * Siguiri Prefecture Category:Regions of Guinea
title: Kankan Region
